name: Rabbit Resuce
description:
Figure out which flowers are toxic, and don't let the rabbits eat them! Score points by letting the rabbits eat the safe flowers.

Use your mouse to move the scissors, and click to cut flowers

Made in Godot in 3 hours for https://itch.io/jam/trijam-118

  • Art by @the.eh.train
  • Code and music by dexterminator
